# player_ui_slot struct

> **来源**: <https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/unrealenginedotcom/temporary/ui/player_ui_slot>
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T07:09:12.782149

---

`widget` creation configuration options.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /UnrealEngine.com/Temporary/UI }` |

## Members

This struct has data members, but no functions.

### Data

| Data Member Name | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `ZOrder` | `int` | Controls `widget` rendering order. Greater values will be draw in front of lesser values. |
| `InputMode` | `ui_input_mode` | Controls `widget` input event consumption. |
